original_definition: 'fully automatic range hood' means a range hood in which the air flow and/or other functions are automatically controlled through sensor(s) during 24 hours including the cooking period;
generated_definition: 'fully automatic range hood' means a range hood that operates automatically without manual intervention, typically using sensors and/or timers to regulate airflow and ventilation.

Article 2: ‘fully automatic range hood’ means a range hood in which the air flow and/or other functions are automatically controlled through sensor(s) during 24 hours including the cooking period;
